revtext: A month ago I have visited wig o mania for a wig in Hyderabad store I really don’t have any idea about the wig and there mrs.preethi helped me a lot for choosing the right one which suits me and she is very helpful for the clinets to clear all the doubts About how to use and maintain the product and the quality here was very good and thanks to Priti for choosing the right one
revreply: Thank you so much for your appreciation. It motivates us to continue to strive to make a difference in people\'s lives
